mapper.select: select a.*, b.name as themaName, b.price as themaPrice from theater a, thema b where a.themaIdx = b.idx;
select a.*, b.name as themaName, b.price as themaPrice from theater a, thema b where a.idx=#{idx} and a.themaIdx = b.idx;
mapper.update: update theater set work=#{work}, modifyDate=now() where idx=#{idx};
update theater set name=#{vo.name}, themaIdx=#{vo.themaIdx}, seat=#{vo.seat}, work=#{vo.work}, modifyDate=now() where idx=#{vo.idx};
update thema set display=#{display}, modifyDate=now() where idx=#{idx};
update thema set mainImg=#{mainImg}, modifyDate=now() where idx=#{idx};
update thema set images=concat(images,#{orgFName}), imgFName= concat(imgFName,#{saveFName}), modifyDate=now() where idx = #{idx};
update thema set images=#{images}, imgFName=#{imgFName}, modifyDate=now() where idx = #{idx};
update thema set mainImg='noImage.jpg', modifyDate=now() where idx = #{idx};
update thema set name=#{vo.name}, price=#{vo.price}, hashTag=#{vo.hashTag}, content=#{vo.content}, modifyDate=now() where idx=#{vo.idx};
